00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 
00092 #include "LRU_List.h"
00093 #include "log_functions.h"
00094 #include "HashData.h"
00095 #include "HashTable.h"
00096 #include "fsal.h"
00097 #include "cache_inode.h"
00098 #include "stuff_alloc.h"
00099 
00100 #include <unistd.h>
00101 #include <sys/types.h>
00102 #include <sys/param.h>
00103 #include <time.h>
00104 #include <pthread.h>
00105 
00106  
00107 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_release( cache_entry_t        * pentry, 
00108                                           hash_table_t         * ht,  
00109                                           cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00110                                           fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext, 
00111                                           cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00112 {
00113   cache_inode_fsal_data_t      fsaldata ;
00114   cache_inode_status_t         status ;
00115   hash_buffer_t                key, old_key, old_value ;
00116   int                          rc ;
00117   cache_inode_fsal_data_t    * ppoolfsdata = NULL ;
00118   cache_inode_parent_entry_t * parent_iter    = NULL ;
00119   fsal_handle_t              * pfsal_handle = NULL ;
00120   
00121   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00122   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00123   
00124   /* Get the fsal handle */
00125   if( ( pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry, pstatus ) ) == NULL )
00126     return *pstatus ;
00127   
00128   /* Build the key */
00129   fsaldata.handle = *pfsal_handle ;
00130   
00131   if( pentry->internal_md.type != DIR_CONTINUE )
00132     fsaldata.cookie = DIR_START ;
00133   else
00134     fsaldata.cookie = pentry->object.dir_cont.dir_cont_pos ;
00135 
00136   if( cache_inode_fsaldata_2_key( &key, &fsaldata, pclient ) )
00137     {
00138       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT,
00139                          "cache_inode_gc_suppress_file: could not build hashtable key" ) ;
00140 
00141       cache_inode_release_fsaldata_key( &key, pclient);
00142       
00143       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00144       return *pstatus ;
00145     }
00146   
00147  /* use the key to delete the entry */
00148   if( ( rc = HashTable_Del( ht, &key, &old_key, &old_value ) ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00149     {
00150       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT,
00151                          "cache_inode_gc_suppress_file: entry could not be deleted, status = %d", rc ) ;
00152       
00153       cache_inode_release_fsaldata_key( &key, pclient);
00154 
00155       return LRU_LIST_DO_NOT_SET_INVALID ;
00156     }
00157 
00158   /* Release key data that was stored in hash table */
00159   cache_inode_release_fsaldata_key( &old_key, pclient);
00160 
00161   /* Sanity check: old_value.pdata is expected to be equal to pentry,
00162    * and is released later in this function */
00163   if ( (cache_entry_t*)old_value.pdata != pentry )
00164   {
00165        DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient->log_outputs, NIV_CRIT,
00166                          "cache_inode_release: unexpected pdata %p from hash table (pentry=%p)",
00167                           old_value.pdata, pentry ) ;
00168   }
00169     
00170   /* Release key data used for this query */
00171   cache_inode_release_fsaldata_key( &key, pclient );
00172   
00173   /* Recover the parent list entries */
00174   for( parent_iter = pentry->parent_list ; parent_iter != NULL ; parent_iter = parent_iter->next_parent )
00175     {
00176       RELEASE_PREALLOC( parent_iter, pclient->pool_parent, next_alloc ) ;
00177     }
00178 
00179   /* Put the pentry back to the pool */
00180   RELEASE_PREALLOC( pentry, pclient->pool_entry, next_alloc ) ;
00181 
00182   /* Destroy the mutex associated with the pentry */
00183   cache_inode_mutex_destroy( pentry ) ;
00184 
00185 
00186   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00187   return *pstatus ;
00188 } /* cache_inode_release */
